name: Verball Abuse
description:
Verball Abuse ⚽

A football game where you have to type to survive! Part of a series of 12 monthly games to be released throughout 2019! Made in a few days.

Your keyboard is the coach. Type the football words when they appear on the screen to make coordinated shots and passes and become the football champion! The faster you type, the better you play - and be try for the longest words to complete more accurate shots on the opponent's goal. First team to 10 points wins the match - the loser leaves with nothing but the shame of defeat.

PLEASE NOTE: This game contains football. The authors of this software have no prior knowledge of football and so the rules presented in the software may or may not be accurate or true-to-life to actual football. Oh, and by football we mean English football or soccer.

Controls

Type the words when prompted on screen!

Price

Would recommend downloading for free; it's only a quick prototype. Don't feel bad! However any donations would be very much appreciated and will win you a credit in future projects ;)
